alert.note: Alert for Kimble; Mason; San Saba (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 01 at 3:09PM CST until February 02 at 6:00AM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Periods of freezing rain are expected tonight through early Thursday morning across the area. The freezing rain could be moderate to heavy at times. Total ice accumulations of one tenth to one half of an inch are possible, with localized higher amounts. * WHERE...Kimble, Mason, and San Saba Counties of West Central Texas. * WHEN...until 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Very hazardous conditions for motorists and pedestrians with the accumulation of ice on roads, sidewalks, bridges and overpasses. Power outages and damage to trees are possible due to the ice accumulations.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
